name: PATHLOGIC
short_description:
The first set of Windows binaries are now uploaded. We are currently testing these across a range of computers and updating these regularly as issues become apparent. A list of known issues are in the release notes/readmes.

The paper describing PATHLOGIC-S has been published  in PLoS One (7th August, 2012). If you use PATHLOGIC-S, please cite:

Fearnley, L.G., Nielsen, L.K. (2012) PATHLOGIC-S: A Scalable Boolean Framework for Modelling Cellular Signalling. PLoS One.

PATHLOGIC-S is tested to be compatible with Cytoscape 2.8.2 and lpsolve 5.5.2. Earlier versions of these SHOULD work - report any problems to the bug tracker here.

An implementation of PATHLOGIC-ST, the next generation of the PATHLOGIC system, is currently undergoing testing pre-release.
summary: Software for simulation of large-scale signalling systems.
